trans-unit.source: Represents the data of a property for a selected item and enables editing of this property with type-specific data.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta i dati di una proprietà per un elemento selezionato e consente la modifica di questa proprietà con i dati specifici del tipo.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> class that serves as a subproperty of the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> classe che funge da sottoproprietà dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For host infrastructure derived classes.
trans-unit.target: Le classi derivate per l'infrastruttura host.

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento padre <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Stores whether the target property value matches a specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Archivia se il valore della proprietà di destinazione corrisponde a un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"> </xref> da applicare.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the category in which this property resides.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della categoria in cui risiede questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the category.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che contiene il nome della categoria.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Enables the host infrastructure to create a new host-specific <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Consente all'infrastruttura host di creare una nuova specifica dell'host <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the encapsulated property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la descrizione della proprietà incapsulata.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the description.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene la descrizione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome visualizzato per il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the display name.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: Declaration of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> event, which occurs when a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> is changed through a call to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.ApplyFilter*> method.
trans-unit.target: Dichiarazione del <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> evento che si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"> </xref> viene modificato tramite una chiamata al <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.ApplyFilter*>metodo.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.ApplyFilter*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a set of standard values is available for this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se un set di valori standard è disponibile per questo <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a set of standard values is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se un set di valori standard è disponibile. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> is custom-made.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> è personalizzata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property entry is custom-made; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la voce di proprietà personalizzata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property entry is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la voce di proprietà è di sola lettura. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches the filter.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> corrisponde al filtro.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value to indicate that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches the filter and fires the event handler method for the property change.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore per indicare che il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> corrisponde al filtro e viene generato il metodo del gestore eventi per la modifica della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> listens to changes made to this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>è in ascolto per le modifiche apportate a questa proprietà.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the target object matches the filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto di destinazione corrisponde al filtro. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implementation of a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> method that determines whether the target display or type name matches the specified string containing the name of a filter.
trans-unit.target: Implementazione di un <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"> </xref> metodo che determina se la destinazione di visualizzare o digitare nome corrisponde alla stringa specificata che contiene il nome di un filtro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> display or type name of a filter to match against the target object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.String>nome visualizzato o del tipo di un filtro da confrontare con l'oggetto di destinazione.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the target display or type name matches the specified string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la destinazione di Visualizza o digitare nome corrisponde alla stringa specificata; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.FilterApplied"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.FilterApplied"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"> </xref> da applicare.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> PropertyChanged event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>evento PropertyChanged.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: The EventArgs for this event.
trans-unit.target: EventArgs per questo evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> event when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> hears that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>eventi quando il <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer>rileva che il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> è stata modificata.</xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property whose value has changed.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della proprietà il cui valore è stato modificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> in classes derived from a host infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elemento padre <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"> </xref> nelle classi derivate da un'infrastruttura host.

trans-unit.source: This is used only for subproperties, so its value can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Viene utilizzato solo per le sottoproprietà, pertanto il relativo valore può essere `null`.

trans-unit.source: A parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Declaration of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> event, which occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Dichiarazione del <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>evento che si verifica quando un valore di proprietà viene modificato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the property name.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: A type that contains the type of the property.
trans-unit.target: Tipo che contiene il tipo della proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> that is used for editing the value of this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> che viene utilizzato per la modifica del valore di questo <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> object that contains the current editor.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"> </xref> oggetto che contiene l'editor corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of possible values supported by this <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un set di valori possibili supportati da questo <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry>.</xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of possible values.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>dei valori possibili.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>
